body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Married to Emily W. McKnight. Father of Nancy A. McKnight and Betty D. McKnight. Served in the 16th U.S. Infantry Regiment as a private from April 24, 1847, to August 7, 1848. Bricklayer in Calloway County, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocer in Calloway County in 1860. Merchant in Calloway County in June 1863.
